recent_work.details: Added Grok and Gemini to agent_capabilities, created fallback chains (Grok→Gemini→DeepSeek→ClaudeOpus), added audit system with staging_review folder
Added Grok text generation for dynamic captions, dev updates, cooking OpenClaw content. Gemini Image Gen 4 with reference images for consistent Borg Farnsworth character
Tweet IDs: 2017769425944850940, 2017770808647561445. Scenes: holographic chart, seafood restaurant

key_discoveries: Grok wasn't in agent_capabilities - caused 'cannot handle dev tasks' errors
Python modules need pycache cleared after git pull
Meme scheduler uses Gemini Imagen 4 with reference images
OAuth2 tokens in oauth2_tokens.json expire in ~2 hours, refresh lasts 6 months

architecture.staging_flow: Agent output → staging_review/pending_audit → ClaudeOpus audit → audited/approved/rejected
